chapters.title: Chapter 38:  Hidden Faces
chapters.info: Eldrith Jhondar, p. 631 (569)—Plump Aes Sedai of the Black Ajah. She was of the Brown Ajah to the rest of the Tower until she left with Liandrin. She hates cats—things might get complicated if Marillin Gemalphin finds out Eldrith has been killing the stray cats she has been adopting.
